text:
@RepMarkGreen @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump The insanity is Congressional Republicans not doing their job. If they had the least intelligent President ever would not have bungled the federal response to #COVID19. But no, defend the impeached, extortionist, profiteering, @realDonaldTrump. 
THE BLOOD IS ALSO ON YOUR HANDS.
